snippet: Attendance at ballparks can be spotty this time of year because of the weather, but the first week and a half of the 2014 season has produced some bleak scenes.
abstract: Small crowds are seen at baseball stadiums across the nation as Opening Week of 2014 comes to an end.
lead_paragraph: Attendance at ballparks can be spotty this time of year because of the weather, but the first week and a half of the 2014 season has produced some bleak scenes.
